meanings.sent1: He got hit in the goolies during the game.
meanings.sent2: The doctor checked his goolies during the physical exam.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his goolies were his lucky charm.
meanings.sent4: The boxer protected his goolies like precious jewels.
meanings.sent5: The cold water made his goolies shrivel up.

meanings.definition: A slang term for the male genitalia.
meanings.sent1: He blurted out a joke about his goolies at the party.
meanings.sent2: The comedian made a hilarious reference to his goolies in the show.
meanings.sent3: He couldn't stop laughing at the word 'goolies'.
meanings.sent4: The song lyrics mentioned his goolies in a catchy way.
meanings.sent5: The statue had an exaggerated depiction of his goolies.
